The Cloud-Based Business Intelligence
and Reporting Portal for Your Enterprise

Protect Your Cardholder Data
Lighthouse enables Shift4's layered security
approach, enabling you to secure your systems
from the ever-growing threat of a data breach.
Point-to- Point Encryption (P2PE)
Reduce your PCI scope and protect cardholder
data from the moment of entry with PCI-validated
P2PE, through a certified gateway,
Tokenization
Replace sensitive cardholder data with non-
sensitive random values (tokens) that can be
stored without risk of breach.
Connect, Integrate, and Innovate
Lighthouse allows you to integrate Shift4's advanced
features with the rest of your business ecosystem.
